message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI 

The paper deals with sinogram denoising for tomographic reconstructions, which is a problem in computer vision (CV). The proposed algorithm is inspired by signal processing on graphs, which falls under information theory (IT) and machine learning (LG). The paper also involves numerical studies and optimization techniques, which are relevant to numerical analysis (NA) and statistics (SI). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV, followed by cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.NA, and cs.SI.
